summary: Diff implements a multi-page website layout with TanStack Router routes for Home and Search, adds a persistent header and footer via a shared SiteLayout, creates a new HomePage with hero + CTAs, and updates global theme tokens to a consistent non-blue/purple palette with light/dark support.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes third-party attribution/link to caffeine.ai and a heart icon (“Built with … caffeine.ai”), which was not requested as part of basic site links/copyright.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only asks for basic site links (e.g., Home, Search) and a short copyright line; external attribution is additional behavior/content not specified.
